title: Xamarin Forms Preview crashes when declaring SKPaint as field
body:
### Description

For performance (doing some animations), I am reusing several `SKPaint` objects by just declaring them as fields. However, Xamarin Forms preview dies as soon as I do so.

### Code

I've declared a few `SKPaint` objects like...

```
private readonly SKPaint Paint_Fill = new SKPaint
{
    Style = SKPaintStyle.Fill,
    IsAntialias = true
};
```

### Expected Behavior

Preview works

### Actual Behavior

Preview crashes (see screenshot below)

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.60.2
- Last known good version:  ?
- IDE:  Visual Studio for Mac
- Platform Target Frameworks: iOS
  - iOS:  11.4
